summary: Tough Guise systematically examines the relationship between pop-cultural imagery and the social construction of masculine identities in the U.S. at the dawn of the 21st century.
cast: Steve Austin|Marlon Brando|James Caan|Seth Green|Eric Harris|Dwayne Johnson|Jackson Katz|Dylan Klebold|Frank Morgan|Al Pacino|Joe Pesci|Arnold Schwarzenegger|Tupac Shakur|Sylvester Stallone|Howard Stern
title: Tough Guise: Violence, Media & the Crisis in Masculinity
